name: galax-civic-networking-app
description: GALAX Civic Networking Application - Root Project

scripts.deployment:check: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run deployment:check
scripts.deployment:test: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run deployment:test
scripts.domain:check: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run domain:check
scripts.build: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run start
scripts.test: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test
scripts.test:api: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test:api
scripts.test:socket: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test:socket
scripts.test:watch: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test:watch
scripts.test:coverage: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:ui: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test:ui
scripts.test:e2e: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test:all
scripts.test:env: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run test:env
scripts.health:log: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run health:log
scripts.branch:analyze: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run branch:analyze
scripts.logs:all: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run logs:all
scripts.dashboard: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run dashboard
scripts.monitor:full: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install && npm run monitor:full
scripts.install:app: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install
scripts.setup: cd GALAX_App_files && test -d node_modules || npm install

author: GALAX Development Team
